metadata.title: CVE-2023-29483 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description: The dnspython stub resolver is vulnerable to a potential DoS if abad-in-some-way response from the right address and port forged by anattacker arrives before a legitimate one on the UDP port dnspython isusing for that query.

criterions.comment: dnspython package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
